name: Alchemize by Schiau
description:
PLAY LIKE THIS
Match 3 or more elements to discover a new one.

YOU GET
• 8 Game Modes (Ranging from 1 minute to 24+ hours of gameplay per game mode)
• 30 elements to combine
• 8 power-ups
• Stunning graphics & Effects
• Game Center
• Universal app


Learn to pronounce Schiau:
'Schi' as in 'Ski' (the sport) + 'au' as in 'auch' (only the sound from au)
Repeat this two together as fast as possible. You got it.

For more information or support, please visit www.schiau.co or email us at apps@schiau.co
Published and developed by Schiau (www.schiau.co).
